meanings.definition: A facility for storing biological samples at very low temperatures.
meanings.sent1: The cryobank kept the plant seeds frozen for future use.
meanings.sent2: Scientists store animal cells in the cryobank to keep them safe.
meanings.sent3: The cryobank was so cold, even the polar bears would need a jacket!
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like frozen treasures in a cryobank of time.
meanings.sent5: The cryobank hummed softly, preserving life in icy slumber.

meanings.definition: To preserve biological material by freezing it in a cryobank.
meanings.sent1: They decided to cryobank the rare flower to protect it from extinction.
meanings.sent2: In order to study the virus, they had to cryobank the samples immediately.
meanings.sent3: She joked that she would cryobank her favorite ice cream to save it for later.
meanings.sent4: His heart seemed to cryobank the memories, freezing them in time.
meanings.sent5: The scientist carefully cryobanked the fragile cells, ensuring their survival.
